name: Goldfish Game
description:
Hey there! This was made for Low Effort Jam 5.

So, in keeping with the spirit of the jam, I made this little game by drawing one image, which I also used for the banner, and making a slightly interactive version of it.

I just messed about with some functions I never used before, and I only worked while lying on my couch.

No sounds or music, because that would be effort.

Have fun!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move
